mapper.select: select b.id, b.ip_no, b.platform_id, b.webtoon_id, b.image_id, b.title, b.contents, b.webtoon_title, b.writer, b.date, p.name from board b, platform p where b.platform_id = p.id ;
mapper.insert: insert into board(ip_no, platform_id, webtoon_id, image_id, title, contents, webtoon_title, writer, date) values(#{ip_no}, #{platform_id}, #{webtoon_id}, #{image_id}, #{title}, #{contents}, #{webtoon_title}, #{writer}, #{date});
